text: Counting Crows is an American rock band from San Francisco, California. == Band members == * Adam Duritz - lead vocals (1991-present) * David Bryson - rhythm guitar, backing vocals (1991-present) * Charlie Gillingham - keyboards, backing vocals (1991-present) * David Immergl√ºck - guitars, backing vocals (1993-present) * Dan Vickley - lead guitar, backing vocals (1994-present) * Jim Bogios - drums (2002-present) == Discography == == Related pages == * List of bands from the San Francisco Bay Area == References == == Other websites == Category:1991 establishments in California Category:Alternative rock bands Category:American pop rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:Musical groups from San Francisco
